name: formql
description: FormQL - A framework for building dynamic forms
author: Juan Stoppa

scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_pack: ng build formql --prod && cd dist/formql && npm pack
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_editor_pack: ng build formql-editor --prod && cd dist/formql-editor && npm pack
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_material_pack: ng build formql-material --prod && cd dist/formql-material && npm pack
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql: ng build formql --prod && cd dist/formql && npm publish
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_editor: ng build formql-editor --prod && cd dist/formql-editor && npm publish
scripts.npm_prepare_library_formql_material: ng build formql-material --prod && cd dist/formql-material && npm publish
scripts.package_all: npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_pack && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_editor_pack && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_material_pack && npm install @formql/core && npm install @formql/editor && npm install @formql/material
scripts.package_and_publish_all: npm run npm_prepare_library_formql && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_editor && npm run npm_prepare_library_formql_material
